meanings.definition: Very thin or slender in form
meanings.sent1: She was the skinniest girl in the class, with arms like twigs.
meanings.sent2: The skinniest model in the fashion show looked elegant and graceful.
meanings.sent3: The skinniest tree in the forest swayed in the breeze, almost dancing.
meanings.sent4: His skinniest paintbrush created delicate strokes on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The skinniest thread held the beautiful tapestry together.

meanings.definition: Having the least amount of fat or flesh
meanings.sent1: The skinniest cat in the litter was always chasing butterflies.
meanings.sent2: She ordered the skinniest latte on the menu to watch her figure.
meanings.sent3: The skinniest dog in the park tried to steal a sandwich from a picnic.
meanings.sent4: His skinniest wallet barely had enough coins for a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent5: The skinniest branch on the tree held a single red apple.

meanings.definition: The least amount or degree of something
meanings.sent1: He had the skinniest of luck, always finding pennies on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The skinniest of the excuses was that the dog ate his homework.
meanings.sent3: The skinniest of the cakes at the party disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her skinniest of smiles showed a hint of sadness in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The skinniest of the trails led to a hidden waterfall.
